definition: Mongol ethnic group/abbr. for Mongolia 蒙古國|蒙古国[Meng3 gu3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Meng2]
to cover/ignorant/to suffer (misfortune)/to receive (a favor)/to cheat

sentences.english: No animation or skinning is imported.
sentences.chinese: 沒有動畫或蒙皮被導入。

sentences.english: The process of connecting the skeleton to the mesh is known as skinning.
sentences.chinese: 這個鏈接骨架和網格的過程就是蒙皮。

sentences.english: The accuracy of flat plate, turbulent skin friction at supersonic speeds.
sentences.chinese: 超音速速度下平板，湍流蒙皮摩擦的精確度。

sentences.english: Salt water corroded the light alloy frames and the fabric wing-covering.
sentences.chinese: 鹽水對輕合金飛機構架和布質機翼蒙皮有腐蝕作用。

sentences.english: And this is called stressed-skin effect of corrugated steel sheet .
sentences.chinese: 這被稱爲壓型鋼板的蒙皮效應。

sentences.english: The entire vehicle is covered with a stiffened skin .
sentences.chinese: 整個飛行器包上了鋼性蒙皮。

sentences.english: AABB of this Skinned Mesh in its local space.
sentences.chinese: 在本地座標空間這個蒙皮網格的AABB。

sentences.english: These include spars, skins, ribs, stringers, etc. , and integral fuel tank structures.
sentences.chinese: 這些包括梁，蒙皮，肋，縱梁等，還有整體油箱結構。

sentences.english: Multi-point stretch forming (MPSF) is a new technique to form aircraft outer skin parts.
sentences.chinese: 多點拉形是成形飛機蒙皮件的一種新技術。

sentences.english: Figure 13. Tangents and Normals changed on a skinned model.
sentences.chinese: 圖十三在蒙皮的模型上切線與法向是變動的。

sentences.english: Time spent applying animations to skinned meshes.
sentences.chinese: 應用動畫爲蒙皮網格花費的時間。

sentences.english: This test will detect any tiny cracks within the aircraft's skin.
sentences.chinese: 這種檢測方法可以檢測出飛機蒙皮上的細小裂紋。

definition: empennage (of an aircraft)/fletching (of an arrow)/fins (of a missile, rocket etc)/rear spoiler (of a car)
body of a vehicle or machine/fuselage of a plane
the front (nose) of a plane etc
